Architecture: all i386 armel armhf amd64 arm64
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), glslang-tools, meson, ninja-build, libwine-dev, libvulkan-dev, spirv-headers, gcc-mingw-w64-x86-64-posix [amd64 arm64], gcc-mingw-w64-i686-posix [i386 armel armhf], g++-mingw-w64-x86-64-posix [amd64 arm64], g++-mingw-w64-i686-posix [i386 armel armhf], rename, llvm
Package-List: dxvk deb utils optional arch=all dxvk-wine32 deb libs optional arch=i386,armel,armhf dxvk-wine32-development deb oldlibs optional arch=i386,armel,armhf dxvk-wine64 deb libs optional arch=amd64,arm64 dxvk-wine64-development deb oldlibs optional arch=amd64,arm64
